item.title: Contact
item.description: Email me at contact@vedtopkar.com Tweet @vedtopkar See my open source code on GitHub See my professional profile on LinkedIn

item.title: Research
item.description: Current Research I currently work in the Das Lab studying the structure of viral and eukaryotic RNA molecules. Past Research Genome Editing At the Joung Lab (Massachusetts General Hospital), I researched methods for improving the safety and specificity of the CRISPR-Cas9 genome editing technology. I contributed to the development of GUIDE-seq, a method for detecting off-target cleavage events induced by genome editing nucleases. A core part of my work was developing a streamlined computational pipeline for easy analysis of GUIDE-seq data.
